item.title: OOP-Î±: A Critical View on OOP
item.description: A critical view on object oriented software design Imagine there had been a couple of people, somewhere buried in the past, that basically invented the complete foundation technologies for everything that continues to shape our reality and will continue to do so for the foreseeable future. Sounds like a cheesy creation myth? But it’s not; it’s actually what happened at Xerox PARC starting in the 1970th. Here’s a list of some of the notable names from the early days of PARC:
